pkgmetadata.longdescription: # EnumyThe problem with Python's "Enum" module is that it is not a reasonable way to restrict variables to a predefined set of values.Latest version: `v1.0.2`## Installation```shellpip install --user enumy```## Special methods### `check_type`Check if a variable matches a certain data type.```pythonvar.check_type(str)```### `check_value`Check if a value is present in the allowed values.```pythontext = "ByteSentinel"var.check_value(text)```## Example```pythonfrom enumy import Enumytest = Enumy(("Value 1", "Value 2"), str)test = "Value 2" # Workingtest = 123 # Exception```
